title: Mahindra Finance raises Rs 500 crore by issuing bonds - Economic Times
content: Mahindra Finance raises Rs 500 crore by issuing bonds  Economic Times
description: The tenure of the bonds is 2 years and 365 days from the deemed date of allotment of the bonds, which is February 15, 2022. The bonds are set to mature on February 14, 2025.
